Package hdfs.replicationsimulator

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AllDatanode  
    Block
    a block of a data item.
    BlockInfo  
    BlocksMap
    Map to store information about blocks
    Daemon
    A thread that has called Thread.setDaemon(boolean) with true.
    Datanode
    A datanode is storing data and execute commands to transfer files.
    DatanodeInfo
    This is the DataInfo that the namenode stores
    DatanodesMap
    Map to store information about datanodes
    Event  
    Main
    Launches the simulator
    Namenode
    This node store the metadata, the blocks locality and handle the replication system
    Node
    Define the general methods for a node (implemented by Datanode & NameNode)
    NodeKiller  
    SimFileGenerator  
    SimTrace  
    Simulator
    Object used to Initialize the system.
    UnderReplicatedBlocks
    Class for keeping track of under replication blocks Blocks have replication priority, with priority 0 indicating the highest Blocks have only one replicas has the highest
